sources.title: Curse Of Bigfoot
sources.description: Originally the movie Teenagers Battle the Thing (1958), this 1975 version is colorized and features additional footage. Generally about a group of students who go on an archaeological dig and uncover a monster. Find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .

metadata.Plot: A group of high school students on an archaeological dig discover a centuries old mummified body in a sealed cave. Removing the mummy, it soon comes back to life, revealing itself to be an inhuman beast that terrorizes a small California town.
metadata.Actors: Bob Clymire, Jan Swihart, Bill Simonsen
